Name: TV Program
Description: A TV program is factual or fictional content that is broadcast on television. It may be a one-off broadcast or a TV series that has episodes. This type includes regular broadcasts (e.g. TV news), TV series or miniseries, television specials, made-for-TV movies and infomercials.

Properties.Name: Original episode running time
Properties.Description: The original running time of an episode, without commercials, in minutes.

Properties.Name: Languages
Properties.Description: The language or languages that this was originally broadcast in.

Properties.Name: Program creator
Properties.Description: The person or persons credited with creating the program.

Properties.Name: Theme song
Properties.Description: For shows that have had more than one theme song (or version of a theme song), you can enter more than one value here.

Properties.Name: Genre
Properties.Description: Genre is a fairly loose type, and includes both the type of program (game show, sit-com, etc.) and something more akin to genres in other media (science fiction, mystery, etc.)

Properties.Name: Filming location(s)
Properties.Description: Location(s) where this TV program was filmed regularly (for specific episode and segment-only locations use the filming location properties on those TV types). Should not be used for occasional "on location" filming or establishing shots.
